typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		sepallength as double,
		sepalwidth as double,
		petallength as double,
		petalwidth as double,
		class as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	batchSize: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(avgsepallength = avg(sepallength),
		avgsepalwidth = avg(sepalwidth),
		avgpetallength = avg(petallength),
		avgpetalwidth = avg(petalwidth)) ~> Aggregate1
source1, Aggregate1 join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 split(sepallength > avgsepallength,
	sepalwidth > avgsepalwidth,
	petallength > avgpetallength,
	petalwidth > avgpetalwidth ,
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(AboveAvgLongSepals, AboveAvgWideSepals, AboveAvgLongPetals, AboveAvgWidePetals, BelowAverage)
